 But Offended...Not A Good Mix! :(

A Proto.
  I'm from B.C. and let me tell you a little something:
  It's OUR=
 water from OUR dams that's giving hydro(power) to California and 
  the up=
per half of the U.S..
  And Canada has more forest country, plus UNPOTCHABL=

r that builds YOUR homes.

s Who and make sure you have

ll...but as a Canadian I cannot stand

t with less credit then I know it
